content.title: Launch the App
content.body:
1. From the Live Preview is ready window, you have two options to view the app:
    • App Viewer Code
    • Scan QR Code
  2. Launch the Volt MX App on your mobile device.
  3. Select the Cloud tab.
  4. In the 5 Digit App Viewer Code input box, enter the App Viewer Code from Iris.
  5. Alternatively, from Volt MX App on your mobile device, go to the Cloud tab and click SCAN QR CODE.

Allow camera access to the Volt MX App.
Scan the QR Code displayed on Iris to view the app.
